trans-unit.source: This package is independent of the SAX2 core, though the functionality exposed generally needs to be implemented within a parser core. That independence has several consequences:

This package is the home of the Java programming language compiler framework. This framework allows clients of the framework to locate and run compilers from programs. The framework also provides Service Provider Interfaces (SPI) for structured access to diagnostics (DiagnosticListener) as well as a file abstraction for overriding file access (JavaFileManager and JavaFileObject). See JavaCompiler for more details on using the SPI.
trans-unit.target: 该软件包是Java编程语言编译器框架的所在地。该框架允许框架的客户端从程序定位并运行编译器。该框架还提供了服务提供者接口（SPI），用于对诊断的结构化访问（DiagnosticListener）以及用于覆盖文件访问的文件抽象（JavaFileManager和JavaFileObject）。有关使用SPI的更多详细信息，请参见JavaCompiler。

trans-unit.source: This package may be updated independently of SAX2 (i.e. new handlers and classes may be added without updating SAX2 itself).

This package presents a framework that allows application developers to make use of security services like authentication, data integrity and data confidentiality from a variety of underlying security mechanisms like Kerberos, using a unified API.

This package presents a framework that allows application developers to make use of security services like authentication, data integrity and data confidentiality from a variety of underlying security mechanisms like Kerberos, using a unified API. The security mechanisms that an application can chose to use are identified with unique object identifiers. One example of such a mechanism is the Kerberos v5 GSS-API mechanism (object identifier 1.2.840.113554.1.2.2). This mechanism is available through the default instance of the GSSManager class.
This package provides a framework for authentication and authorization.
trans-unit.target: 这个软件包提供了一个认证和授权的框架。

trans-unit.source: This package provides a framework for authentication and authorization. The framework allows authentication to be performed in pluggable fashion. Different authentication modules can be plugged under an application without requiring modifications to the application itself. The authorization component allows specification of access controls based on code location, code signers and code executors (Subjects).
trans-unit.target: 这个软件包提供了一个认证和授权的框架。该框架允许以可插拔的方式进行认证。不同的认证模块可以插入到一个应用程序中,而不需要修改应用程序本身。授权组件允许根据代码位置、代码签署者和代码执行者(Subjects)指定访问控制。

trans-unit.source: This package provides a pluggable authentication framework.
trans-unit.target: 这个包提供了一个可插拔的认证框架。

trans-unit.source: This package provides the classes necessary for services to interact with applications in order to retrieve information (authentication data including usernames or passwords, for example) or to display information (error and warning messages, for example).
trans-unit.target: 这个包提供了服务与应用程序交互所需的类,以便检索信息(例如包括用户名或密码在内的认证数据)或显示信息(例如错误和警告信息)。

trans-unit.source: This package provides the interface to be used for implementing pluggable authentication modules.
trans-unit.target: 这个包提供了用于实现可插拔认证模块的接口。

trans-unit.source: This package provides tools that allow the units and fields of date and time to be accessed in a general way most suited for frameworks. Temporal provides the abstraction for date time types that support fields. Its methods support getting the value of a field, creating a new date time with the value of a field modified, and querying for additional information, typically used to extract the offset or time-zone.
trans-unit.target: 该软件包提供的工具允许以最适合框架的通用方式访问日期和时间的单位和字段。 Temporal 提供支持字段的日期时间类型的抽象。其方法支持获取字段的值，创建具有修改后的字段的值的新日期时间，以及查询通常用于提取偏移量或时区的其他信息。

trans-unit.source: This package specifies five standard JDBC RowSet interfaces. All five extend the RowSet interface described in the JDBC 3.0 specification. It is anticipated that additional definitions of more specialized JDBC RowSet types will emerge as this technology matures. Future definitions

This package, SAX2-ext, is a standardized extension to SAX2. It is designed both to allow SAX parsers to pass certain types of information to applications, and to serve as a simple model for other SAX2 parser extension packages. Not all such extension packages should need to be recognized directly by parsers, however. As an example, most validation systems can be cleanly layered on top of parsers supporting the standardized SAX2 interfaces.

trans-unit.source: This parse method is convenient for use when the parser can handle optional elements. For example, a pattern of 'uuuu-MM-dd HH.mm[ VV]' can be fully parsed to a ZonedDateTime, or partially parsed to a LocalDateTime. The queries must be specified in order, starting from the best matching full-parse option and ending with the worst matching minimal parse option. The query is typically a method reference to a from(TemporalAccessor) method.
trans-unit.target: 当解析器可以处理可选元素时，使用此解析方法很方便。例如，“ uuuu-MM-dd HH.mm [VV]”模式可以完全解析为 ZonedDateTime ，也可以部分解析为 LocalDateTime 。必须按顺序指定查询，从最匹配的全解析选项开始，到最差的匹配最小解析选项结束。该查询通常是对 from(TemporalAccessor) 方法的方法引用。

trans-unit.source: This parses the entire text producing a temporal object. It is typically more useful to use parse(CharSequence, TemporalQuery). The result of this method is TemporalAccessor which has been resolved, applying basic validation checks to help ensure a valid date-time.

trans-unit.source: This parsing operation uses the calendar to produce a Date. As a result, the calendar's date-time fields and the TimeZone value may have been overwritten, depending on subclass implementations. Any TimeZone value that has previously been set by a call to setTimeZone may need to be restored for further operations.

This parsing operation uses the calendar to produce a Date. All of the calendar's date-time fields are cleared before parsing, and the calendar's default values of the date-time fields are used for any missing date-time information. For example, the year value of the parsed Date is 1970 with GregorianCalendar if no year value is given from the parsing operation. The TimeZone value may be overwritten, depending on the given pattern and the time zone value in text. Any TimeZone value that has previously been set by a call to setTimeZone may need to be restored for further operations.

This parsing operation uses the calendar to produce a Date. All of the calendar's date-time fields are cleared before parsing, and the calendar's default values of the date-time fields are used for any missing date-time information. For example, the year value of the parsed Date is 1970 with GregorianCalendar if no year value is given from the parsing operation. The TimeZone value may be overwritten, depending on the given pattern and the time zone value in text. Any TimeZone value that has previously been set by a call to setTimeZone may need to be restored for further operations.

This process of rounding advance widths for rasterized glyphs to integer distances means that the character density and the overall length of a string of text will be different from the theoretical design measurements due to the accumulation of a series of small differences in the adjusted widths of each glyph. The specific differences will be different for each glyph, some being wider and some being narrower than their theoretical design measurements. Thus the overall difference in character density and length will vary by a number of factors including the font, the specific device resolution being targeted, and the glyphs chosen to represent the string being rendered. As a result, rendering the same string at multiple device resolutions can yield widely varying metrics for whole strings.
This processing will take effect even if the isValidating() method returns false.

trans-unit.source: This protocol is written by JVM 1.2. Externalizable data is written in block data mode and is terminated with TC_ENDBLOCKDATA. Externalizable class descriptor flags has SC_BLOCK_DATA enabled. JVM 1.1.6 and greater can read this format change. Enables writing a nonSerializable class descriptor into the stream. The serialVersionUID of a nonSerializable class is set to 0L.
trans-unit.target: 该协议由JVM 1.2编写。可外置数据以块数据模式写入,并以TC_ENDBLOCKDATA终止。可外部化的类描述符标志有SC_BLOCK_DATA启用。JVM 1.1.6及更高版本可以读取这种格式变化。启用将非Serializable类描述符写入流中。非序列化类的serialVersionUID被设置为0L。

trans-unit.source: This provides access to historic information on how the amount of daylight savings has changed over time. This is the difference between the standard offset and the actual offset. Typically the amount is zero during winter and one hour during summer. Time-zones are second-based, so the nanosecond part of the duration will be zero.
trans-unit.target: 这提供了有关夏令时量随时间变化的历史信息。这是标准偏移量和实际偏移量之间的差异。通常情况下,冬季的偏移量为零,夏季为一小时。时区是以秒为基础的,所以持续时间的纳秒部分将为零。

trans-unit.source: This provides access to historic information on how the standard offset has changed over time. The standard offset is the offset before any daylight saving time is applied. This is typically the offset applicable during winter.

trans-unit.source: This queries a TemporalAccessor for the chronology. If the target TemporalAccessor represents a date, or part of a date, then it should return the chronology that the date is expressed in. As a result of this definition, objects only representing time, such as LocalTime, will return null.
trans-unit.target: 这将查询 TemporalAccessor 的年代。如果目标 TemporalAccessor 表示日期或日期的一部分，则它应返回表示日期的年代顺序。作为此定义的结果，仅表示时间的对象（例如 LocalTime ）将返回null。

trans-unit.source: This queries a TemporalAccessor for the time precision. If the target TemporalAccessor represents a consistent or complete date-time, date or time then this must return the smallest precision actually supported. Note that fields such as NANO_OF_DAY and NANO_OF_SECOND are defined to always return ignoring the precision, thus this is the only way to find the actual smallest supported unit. For example, were GregorianCalendar to implement TemporalAccessor it would return a precision of MILLIS.
trans-unit.target: 这将向 TemporalAccessor 查询时间精度。如果目标 TemporalAccessor 表示一致或完整的日期时间，日期或时间，则必须返回实际支持的最小精度。请注意，将诸如 NANO_OF_DAY 和 NANO_OF_SECOND 之类的字段定义为始终返回而忽略精度，因此这是找到实际最小支持单位的唯一方法。例如，如果 GregorianCalendar 实现 TemporalAccessor ，它将返回 MILLIS 的精度。

trans-unit.source: This queries a TemporalAccessor for the zone. It first tries to obtain the zone, using zoneId(). If that is not found it tries to obtain the offset(). Thus a ZonedDateTime will return the result of getZone(), while an OffsetDateTime will return the result of getOffset().

This queries a TemporalAccessor for the zone. It first tries to obtain the zone, using zoneId(). If that is not found it tries to obtain the offset(). Thus a ZonedDateTime will return the result of getZone(), while an OffsetDateTime will return the result of getOffset().
trans-unit.target: 这将查询该区域的 TemporalAccessor 。它首先尝试使用 zoneId() 获得区域。如果未找到，它将尝试获取 offset() 。因此， ZonedDateTime 将返回 getZone() 的结果，而 OffsetDateTime 将返回 getOffset() 的结果。

trans-unit.source: This queries a TemporalAccessor for the zone. The zone is only returned if the date-time conceptually contains a ZoneId. It will not be returned if the date-time only conceptually has an ZoneOffset. Thus a ZonedDateTime will return the result of getZone(), but an OffsetDateTime will return null.
trans-unit.target: 这将查询该区域的 TemporalAccessor 。仅当日期时间概念上包含 ZoneId 时，才返回该区域。如果日期时间仅在概念上具有 ZoneOffset ，则不会返回该值。因此， ZonedDateTime 将返回 getZone() 的结果，但是 OffsetDateTime 将返回null。

trans-unit.source: This reason indicates that it is known or suspected that the certificate subject's private key has been compromised.
This reason indicates that it is known or suspected that the certificate subject's private key has been compromised. It applies to authority attribute (AA) certificates only.
trans-unit.target: 此原因表示知道或怀疑证书主体的私钥被泄露。它只适用于权威属性(AA)证书。

trans-unit.source: This reason indicates that it is known or suspected that the certificate subject's private key has been compromised. It applies to certificate authority (CA) certificates only.
trans-unit.target: 此原因表示已知或怀疑证书主体的私钥已被泄露。它只适用于证书颁发机构(CA)的证书。

trans-unit.source: This reason indicates that it is known or suspected that the certificate subject's private key has been compromised. It applies to end-entity certificates only.
trans-unit.target: 此原因表示知道或怀疑证书主体的私钥被泄露。此理由只适用于终端实体证书。

trans-unit.source: This reason indicates that it is unspecified as to why the certificate has been revoked.
trans-unit.target: 这个原因表示没有说明证书被废止的原因。

trans-unit.source: This reason indicates that the certificate has been put on hold.
trans-unit.target: 这个原因表明证书已被搁置。

trans-unit.source: This reason indicates that the certificate has been superseded.
trans-unit.target: 这个原因表明证书已被取代。

trans-unit.source: This reason indicates that the certificate is no longer needed.
trans-unit.target: 这个原因表明证书不再需要了。

trans-unit.source: This reason indicates that the certificate was previously on hold and should be removed from the CRL.
This reason indicates that the certificate was previously on hold and should be removed from the CRL. It is for use with delta CRLs.
trans-unit.target: 此原因表明证书以前被搁置,应从CRL中删除。此理由适用于 delta CRL。

trans-unit.source: This reason indicates that the privileges granted to the subject of the certificate have been withdrawn.
trans-unit.target: 此原因表明授予证书主体的特权已被撤销。

trans-unit.source: This reason indicates that the subject's name or other information has changed.
trans-unit.target: 这个原因说明当事人的姓名或其他信息发生了变化。

trans-unit.source: This rectangle is offset by (getDestinationOffset().x, getDestinationOffset().y) and clipped against the destination bounds. If no destination image has been set, the destination is defined to have a width of getDestinationOffset().x + w, and a height of getDestinationOffset().y + h so that all pixels of the source region may be written to the destination.
trans-unit.target: 此矩形偏移（ getDestinationOffset().x ， getDestinationOffset().y ）并针对目标边界进行裁剪。如果未设置目标图像，则将目标定义为具有 getDestinationOffset().x + w 的宽度和 getDestinationOffset().y + h 的高度，以便可以将源区域的所有像素写入目标。

trans-unit.source: This represents concept of the count of days within the period of a week where the weeks are aligned to the start of the month. This field is typically used with ALIGNED_WEEK_OF_MONTH.

trans-unit.source: This represents concept of the count of days within the period of a week where the weeks are aligned to the start of the year. This field is typically used with ALIGNED_WEEK_OF_YEAR.

trans-unit.target: 这表示一周内与星期初对齐的天数的概念。此字段通常与 ALIGNED_WEEK_OF_YEAR 一起使用。

trans-unit.source: This represents concept of the count of weeks within the period of a month where the weeks are aligned to the start of the month. This field is typically used with ALIGNED_DAY_OF_WEEK_IN_MONTH.
This represents concept of the count of weeks within the period of a month where the weeks are aligned to the start of the month. This field is typically used with ALIGNED_DAY_OF_WEEK_IN_MONTH.
trans-unit.target: 这表示一个月周期内的周数概念，其中周与月初对齐。此字段通常与 ALIGNED_DAY_OF_WEEK_IN_MONTH 一起使用。

trans-unit.source: This represents concept of the count of weeks within the period of a year where the weeks are aligned to the start of the year. This field is typically used with ALIGNED_DAY_OF_WEEK_IN_YEAR.
This represents concept of the count of weeks within the period of a year where the weeks are aligned to the start of the year. This field is typically used with ALIGNED_DAY_OF_WEEK_IN_YEAR.
trans-unit.target: 这代表了一年中某周数与一年之初对齐的一周数的概念。此字段通常与 ALIGNED_DAY_OF_WEEK_IN_YEAR 一起使用。

trans-unit.source: This represents the concept of the count of weeks within the month where weeks start on a fixed day-of-week, such as Monday. This field is typically used with dayOfWeek().
This represents the concept of the count of weeks within the month where weeks start on a fixed day-of-week, such as Monday. This field is typically used with dayOfWeek().
trans-unit.target: 这表示一个月中的周数的概念，其中周从固定的一周中的某天（例如星期一）开始。该字段通常与 dayOfWeek() 一起使用。

trans-unit.source: This represents the concept of the count of weeks within the year where weeks start on a fixed day-of-week, such as Monday and each week belongs to exactly one year. This field is typically used with dayOfWeek() and weekBasedYear().

This represents the concept of the count of weeks within the year where weeks start on a fixed day-of-week, such as Monday and each week belongs to exactly one year. This field is typically used with dayOfWeek() and weekBasedYear().
trans-unit.target: 这表示一年中的周数的概念，其中周从固定的一周中的某一天开始，例如星期一，而每个星期恰好属于一年。该字段通常与 dayOfWeek() 和 weekBasedYear() 一起使用。

trans-unit.source: This represents the concept of the count of weeks within the year where weeks start on a fixed day-of-week, such as Monday. This field is typically used with dayOfWeek().
This represents the concept of the count of weeks within the year where weeks start on a fixed day-of-week, such as Monday. This field is typically used with dayOfWeek().

trans-unit.source: This represents the concept of the day within the month. In the default ISO calendar system, this has values from 1 to 31 in most months. April, June, September, November have days from 1 to 30, while February has days from 1 to 28, or 29 in a leap year.
trans-unit.target: 这代表了月内一天的概念。在默认的ISO日历系统中,大多数月份的数值为1至31。4月、6月、9月、11月的日数为1至30,而2月的日数为1至28,或闰年的29。

trans-unit.source: This represents the concept of the day within the year. In the default ISO calendar system, this has values from 1 to 365 in standard years and 1 to 366 in leap years.
trans-unit.target: 这代表了年内一天的概念。在默认的ISO日历系统中,标准年的值为1至365,闰年为1至366。

trans-unit.source: This represents the concept of the era, which is the largest division of the time-line. This field is typically used with YEAR_OF_ERA.
This represents the concept of the era, which is the largest division of the time-line. This field is typically used with YEAR_OF_ERA.
trans-unit.target: 这代表了时代的概念，这是时间线的最大划分。该字段通常与 YEAR_OF_ERA 一起使用。

trans-unit.source: This represents the concept of the month within the year. In the default ISO calendar system, this has values from January (1) to December (12).
trans-unit.target: 这代表了一年中月份的概念。在默认的ISO日历系统中,它的值从1月(1)到12月(12)。

trans-unit.source: This represents the concept of the offset in seconds of local time from UTC/Greenwich.
trans-unit.target: 这代表了从UTC/格林威治到当地时间偏移的概念,以秒为单位。

trans-unit.source: This represents the concept of the sequential count of seconds where 1970-01-01T00:00Z (ISO) is zero. This field may be used with NANO_OF_SECOND to represent the fraction of the second.
This represents the concept of the sequential count of seconds where 1970-01-01T00:00Z (ISO) is zero. This field may be used with NANO_OF_SECOND to represent the fraction of the second.
trans-unit.target: 这代表秒计数的概念，其中1970-01-01T00：00Z（ISO）为零。此字段可与 NANO_OF_SECOND 一起使用，以表示秒的分数。

trans-unit.source: This represents the concept of the year where weeks start on a fixed day-of-week, such as Monday and each week belongs to exactly one year. This field is typically used with dayOfWeek() and weekOfWeekBasedYear().

This represents the concept of the year where weeks start on a fixed day-of-week, such as Monday and each week belongs to exactly one year. This field is typically used with dayOfWeek() and weekOfWeekBasedYear().
trans-unit.target: 这代表一年的概念，其中周从固定的一周中的某天开始，例如星期一，而每个星期恰好属于一年。该字段通常与 dayOfWeek() 和 weekOfWeekBasedYear() 一起使用。

trans-unit.source: This represents the concept of the year within the era. This field is typically used with ERA.
This represents the concept of the year within the era. This field is typically used with ERA.
trans-unit.target: 这代表了时代的一年的概念。该字段通常与 ERA 一起使用。

trans-unit.source: This represents the concept of the year, counting sequentially and using negative numbers. The proleptic year is not interpreted in terms of the era. See YEAR_OF_ERA for an example showing the mapping from proleptic year to year-of-era.

This represents the concept of the year, counting sequentially and using negative numbers. The proleptic year is not interpreted in terms of the era. See YEAR_OF_ERA for an example showing the mapping from proleptic year to year-of-era.
trans-unit.target: 这代表年份的概念，按顺序计数并使用负数。最多的年份不是根据时代来解释的。请参阅 YEAR_OF_ERA ，以获取显示从多年前年份到年份的映射的示例。

trans-unit.source: This represents the standard concept of the day of the week. In the default ISO calendar system, this has values from Monday (1) to Sunday (7). The DayOfWeek class can be used to interpret the result.
trans-unit.target: 这代表了星期几的标准概念。在默认的ISO日历系统中，其值从星期一（1）到星期日（7）。在 DayOfWeek 类可以用来解释结果。

trans-unit.source: This requesting user name attribute's locale and object's locale are equal.
trans-unit.target: 该请求用户名属性的语言环境和 object 的语言环境相等。

trans-unit.source: This requesting user name attribute's underlying string and object's underlying string are equal.
trans-unit.target: 该请求用户名属性的基础字符串和 object 的基础字符串相等。

trans-unit.source: This restriction also applies to models attached to Swing components. For example, if a TableModel is attached to a JTable, the TableModel should only be modified on the event dispatching thread. If you modify the model on a separate thread you run the risk of exceptions and possible display corruption.

This result of evaluating an expression is converted to an instance of the desired return type. Valid return types are defined in XPathConstants. Conversion to the return type follows XPath conversion rules.
This returns a ChronoLocalDateTime formed from this date at the specified time. All possible combinations of date and time are valid.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回从该日期在指定时间开始形成的 ChronoLocalDateTime 。日期和时间的所有可能组合均有效。

trans-unit.source: This returns a ChronoZonedDateTime formed from this date-time at the specified time-zone. The result will match this date-time as closely as possible. Time-zone rules, such as daylight savings, mean that not every local date-time is valid for the specified zone, thus the local date-time may be adjusted.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回从该日期时间在指定时区形成的 ChronoZonedDateTime 。结果将尽可能与此日期时间匹配。夏时制等时区规则意味着，并非每个本地日期时间都对指定时区有效，因此可以调整本地日期时间。

trans-unit.source: This returns a Chronology based on the specified locale, typically returning IsoChronology. Other calendar systems are only returned if they are explicitly selected within the locale.
trans-unit.target: 这将根据指定的语言环境返回一个 Chronology ，通常返回 IsoChronology 。仅当在语言环境中明确选择其他日历系统时，才返回它们。

trans-unit.source: This returns a HijrahDate with the specified fields. The day must be valid for the year and month, otherwise an exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回带有指定字段的 HijrahDate 。该日期必须对年和月有效，否则将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: This returns a Instant, based on this one, with the amount in terms of the unit subtracted. If it is not possible to subtract the amount, because the unit is not supported or for some other reason, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 这将基于此返回 Instant ，并减去以单位表示的数量。如果由于该单元不受支持或出于某些其他原因而无法减去该数量，则会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: This returns a JapaneseDate with the specified fields. The day must be valid for the year and month, otherwise an exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回带有指定字段的 JapaneseDate 。该日期必须对年和月有效，否则将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: This returns a LocalDate based on this year-month. The day-of-month is set to the last valid day of the month, taking into account leap years.
trans-unit.target: 这将基于今年的月份返回 LocalDate 。考虑到leap年，该月的日期设置为该月的最后一个有效日期。

trans-unit.source: This returns a LocalDate formed from this month-day and the specified year.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回从该月日和指定年份形成的 LocalDate 。

trans-unit.source: This returns a LocalDate formed from this year and the specified day-of-year.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回从今年和指定的日期组成的 LocalDate 。

trans-unit.source: This returns a LocalDate formed from this year and the specified month-day.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回从今年和指定的月日开始形成的 LocalDate 。

trans-unit.source: This returns a LocalDate formed from this year-month and the specified day-of-month.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回从本年月份和指定的月份中形成的 LocalDate 。

trans-unit.source: This returns a LocalDate with the same year, month and day as this date-time.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回与该日期时间相同的年，月和日的 LocalDate 。

trans-unit.source: This returns a LocalDate with the specified epoch-day. The EPOCH_DAY is a simple incrementing count of days where day 0 is 1970-01-01. Negative numbers represent earlier days.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回具有指定的纪元日期的 LocalDate 。该 EPOCH_DAY 是天，其中0天1970-01-01简单递增计数。负数表示较早的日子。

trans-unit.source: This returns a LocalDate with the specified year and day-of-year. The day-of-year must be valid for the year, otherwise an exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回具有指定年份和年份的 LocalDate 。年份中的年份必须对该年份有效，否则将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: This returns a LocalDate with the specified year, month and day-of-month. The day must be valid for the year and month, otherwise an exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回具有指定年，月和日的 LocalDate 。该日期必须对年和月有效，否则将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: This returns a LocalDate, based on this one, with the amount in terms of the unit added. If it is not possible to add the amount, because the unit is not supported or for some other reason, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 这将基于此返回 LocalDate ，并以添加的单位为单位。如果由于不支持该单位或由于其他原因而无法增加金额，则会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: This returns a LocalDate, based on this one, with the amount in terms of the unit subtracted. If it is not possible to subtract the amount, because the unit is not supported or for some other reason, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 这将基于此返回 LocalDate ，并减去以单位表示的数量。如果由于该单元不受支持或出于某些其他原因而无法减去该数量，则会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: This returns a LocalDate, based on this one, with the date adjusted. The adjustment takes place using the specified adjuster strategy object. Read the documentation of the adjuster to understand what adjustment will be made.
trans-unit.target: 这将基于此返回 LocalDate ，并调整日期。使用指定的调节器策略对象进行调节。阅读调节器的文档以了解将进行的调节。

trans-unit.source: This returns a LocalDate, based on this one, with the specified amount added. The amount is typically Period but may be any other type implementing the TemporalAmount interface.
trans-unit.target: 这将基于此返回 LocalDate ，并添加指定的数量。该金额通常是 Period ,但可以是实现 TemporalAmount 接口的任何其他类型。

trans-unit.source: This returns a LocalDate, based on this one, with the specified amount subtracted. The amount is typically Period but may be any other type implementing the TemporalAmount interface.
trans-unit.target: 这将基于此返回 LocalDate ，并减去指定的数量。该金额通常是 Period ,但可以是实现 TemporalAmount 接口的任何其他类型。

trans-unit.source: This returns a LocalDate, based on this one, with the value for the specified field changed. This can be used to change any supported field, such as the year, month or day-of-month. If it is not possible to set the value, because the field is not supported or for some other reason, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 这将基于此返回 LocalDate ，并且更改指定字段的值。这可用于更改任何受支持的字段，例如年，月或日。如果由于该字段不受支持或由于其他原因而无法设置该值，则会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: This returns a LocalDateTime formed from this date at the specified hour and minute. The seconds and nanosecond fields will be set to zero. The individual time fields must be within their valid range. All possible combinations of date and time are valid.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回从该日期开始在指定的小时和分钟处形成的 LocalDateTime 。秒和纳秒字段将设置为零。各个时间字段必须在其有效范围内。日期和时间的所有可能组合均有效。

trans-unit.source: This returns a LocalDateTime formed from this date at the specified hour, minute and second. The nanosecond field will be set to zero. The individual time fields must be within their valid range. All possible combinations of date and time are valid.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回从该日期在指定的小时，分​​钟和秒处形成的 LocalDateTime 。纳秒字段将设置为零。各个时间字段必须在其有效范围内。日期和时间的所有可能组合均有效。

trans-unit.source: This returns a LocalDateTime formed from this date at the specified hour, minute, second and nanosecond. The individual time fields must be within their valid range. All possible combinations of date and time are valid.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回从该日期开始在指定的小时，分​​钟，秒和纳秒处形成的 LocalDateTime 。各个时间字段必须在其有效范围内。日期和时间的所有可能组合均有效。

trans-unit.source: This returns a LocalDateTime formed from this date at the specified time. All possible combinations of date and time are valid.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回从该日期在指定时间开始形成的 LocalDateTime 。日期和时间的所有可能组合均有效。

trans-unit.source: This returns a LocalDateTime formed from this date at the time of midnight, 00:00, at the start of this date.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回一个从该日期开始的午夜00:00的日期开始的 LocalDateTime 。

trans-unit.source: This returns a LocalDateTime formed from this time at the specified date. All possible combinations of date and time are valid.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回从此时间在指定日期开始形成的 LocalDateTime 。日期和时间的所有可能组合均有效。

trans-unit.source: This returns a LocalDateTime with the same year, month, day and time as this date-time.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回与该日期时间相同的年，月，日和时间的 LocalDateTime 。

trans-unit.source: This returns a LocalDateTime with the specified year, month, day-of-month, hour and minute. The day must be valid for the year and month, otherwise an exception will be thrown. The second and nanosecond fields will be set to zero.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回具有指定的年，月，月，日和分钟的 LocalDateTime 。该日期必须对年和月有效，否则将引发异常。第二和纳秒字段将设置为零。

trans-unit.source: This returns a LocalDateTime with the specified year, month, day-of-month, hour, minute and second. The day must be valid for the year and month, otherwise an exception will be thrown. The nanosecond field will be set to zero.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回具有指定的年，月，月，小时，分钟和秒的 LocalDateTime 。该日期必须对年和月有效，否则将引发异常。纳秒字段将设置为零。

trans-unit.source: This returns a LocalDateTime with the specified year, month, day-of-month, hour, minute, second and nanosecond. The day must be valid for the year and month, otherwise an exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回具有指定的年，月，月日，小时，分钟，秒和纳秒的 LocalDateTime 。该日期必须对年和月有效，否则将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: This returns a LocalDateTime, based on this one, with the amount in terms of the unit added. If it is not possible to add the amount, because the unit is not supported or for some other reason, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 这将基于此返回 LocalDateTime ，并以添加的单位为单位。如果由于不支持该单位或由于其他原因而无法增加金额，则会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: This returns a LocalDateTime, based on this one, with the amount in terms of the unit subtracted. If it is not possible to subtract the amount, because the unit is not supported or for some other reason, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 这将基于此返回 LocalDateTime ，并减去以单位表示的金额。如果由于该单元不受支持或出于某些其他原因而无法减去该数量，则会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: This returns a LocalDateTime, based on this one, with the date-time adjusted. The adjustment takes place using the specified adjuster strategy object. Read the documentation of the adjuster to understand what adjustment will be made.
trans-unit.target: 这将基于此返回 LocalDateTime ，并调整日期时间。使用指定的调节器策略对象进行调节。阅读调节器的文档以了解将进行的调节。

trans-unit.source: This returns a LocalDateTime, based on this one, with the specified amount added. The amount is typically Period or Duration but may be any other type implementing the TemporalAmount interface.
trans-unit.target: 这将基于此返回 LocalDateTime ，并添加指定的数量。该金额通常是 Period 或 Duration ,但可以是实现 TemporalAmount 接口的任何其他类型。

trans-unit.source: This returns a LocalDateTime, based on this one, with the specified amount subtracted. The amount is typically Period or Duration but may be any other type implementing the TemporalAmount interface.
trans-unit.target: 这将基于此返回 LocalDateTime ，并减去指定的数量。该金额通常是 Period 或 Duration ,但可以是实现 TemporalAmount 接口的任何其他类型。

trans-unit.source: This returns a LocalDateTime, based on this one, with the value for the specified field changed. This can be used to change any supported field, such as the year, month or day-of-month. If it is not possible to set the value, because the field is not supported or for some other reason, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 这将基于此返回 LocalDateTime ，并更改指定字段的值。这可用于更改任何受支持的字段，例如年，月或日。如果由于该字段不受支持或由于其他原因而无法设置该值，则会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: This returns a LocalTime with the same hour, minute, second and nanosecond as this date-time.
trans-unit.target: 这会返回一个 LocalTime 以相同的小时，分钟，秒和纳秒为这个日期时间。

trans-unit.source: This returns a LocalTime with the specified hour and minute. The second and nanosecond fields will be set to zero.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回具有指定小时和分钟的 LocalTime 。第二和纳秒字段将设置为零。

trans-unit.source: This returns a LocalTime with the specified hour, minute and second. The nanosecond field will be set to zero.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回具有指定小时，分钟和秒的 LocalTime 。纳秒字段将设置为零。

trans-unit.source: This returns a LocalTime with the specified hour, minute, second and nanosecond.
trans-unit.target: 这会返回一个 LocalTime 与指定的小时，分钟，秒和纳秒。

trans-unit.source: This returns a LocalTime with the specified nanosecond-of-day.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回具有指定的纳秒的 LocalTime 。

trans-unit.source: This returns a LocalTime with the specified second-of-day. The nanosecond field will be set to zero.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回指定的第二天的 LocalTime 。纳秒字段将设置为零。

trans-unit.source: This returns a LocalTime, based on this one, with the amount in terms of the unit added. If it is not possible to add the amount, because the unit is not supported or for some other reason, an exception is thrown.

trans-unit.target: 这将基于此返回 LocalTime ，并减去以单位表示的数量。如果由于该单元不受支持或出于某些其他原因而无法减去该数量，则会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: This returns a LocalTime, based on this one, with the specified amount added. The amount is typically Duration but may be any other type implementing the TemporalAmount interface.
trans-unit.target: 这将基于此返回 LocalTime ，并添加指定的数量。该数量通常是 Duration ,但是可以是实现 TemporalAmount 接口的任何其他类型。

trans-unit.source: This returns a LocalTime, based on this one, with the specified amount subtracted. The amount is typically Duration but may be any other type implementing the TemporalAmount interface.
trans-unit.target: 这将基于此返回 LocalTime ，并减去指定的数量。该数量通常是 Duration ,但是可以是实现 TemporalAmount 接口的任何其他类型。

trans-unit.source: This returns a LocalTime, based on this one, with the time adjusted. The adjustment takes place using the specified adjuster strategy object. Read the documentation of the adjuster to understand what adjustment will be made.
trans-unit.target: 这将基于该时间返回 LocalTime ，并调整时间。使用指定的调节器策略对象进行调节。阅读调节器的文档以了解将进行的调节。

trans-unit.source: This returns a LocalTime, based on this one, with the value for the specified field changed. This can be used to change any supported field, such as the hour, minute or second. If it is not possible to set the value, because the field is not supported or for some other reason, an exception is thrown.

trans-unit.source: This returns a MinguoDate with the specified fields. The day must be valid for the year and month, otherwise an exception will be thrown.

trans-unit.source: This returns a TemporalQuery that can be used to query a temporal object for the local date. The query will return null if the temporal object cannot supply a local date.

trans-unit.source: This returns a TemporalQuery that can be used to query a temporal object for the local time. The query will return null if the temporal object cannot supply a local time.

trans-unit.source: This returns a TemporalQuery that can be used to query a temporal object for the offset. The query will return null if the temporal object cannot supply an offset.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回一个 TemporalQuery ，可用于查询临时对象的偏移量。如果时间对象无法提供偏移量，则查询将返回null。

trans-unit.target: 这将基于此返回 YearMonth ，并添加指定的数量。该金额通常是 Period ,但可以是实现 TemporalAmount 接口的任何其他类型。

trans-unit.source: This returns a YearMonth, based on this one, with the specified amount subtracted. The amount is typically Period but may be any other type implementing the TemporalAmount interface.
trans-unit.target: 这将基于此返回 YearMonth ，并减去指定的数量。该金额通常是 Period ,但可以是实现 TemporalAmount 接口的任何其他类型。

trans-unit.source: This returns a YearMonth, based on this one, with the value for the specified field changed. This can be used to change any supported field, such as the year or month. If it is not possible to set the value, because the field is not supported or for some other reason, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 这将基于此返回 YearMonth ，并更改指定字段的值。这可用于更改任何受支持的字段，例如年份或月份。如果由于该字段不受支持或出于其他原因而无法设置该值，则将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: This returns a YearMonth, based on this one, with the year-month adjusted. The adjustment takes place using the specified adjuster strategy object. Read the documentation of the adjuster to understand what adjustment will be made.
trans-unit.target: 这将基于此返回 YearMonth ，并调整年份-月份。使用指定的调节器策略对象进行调节。阅读调节器的文档以了解将进行的调节。

trans-unit.source: This returns a ZonedDateTime formed from this date-time and the specified time-zone. This conversion will ignore the visible local date-time and use the underlying instant instead. This avoids any problems with local time-line gaps or overlaps. The result might have different values for fields such as hour, minute an even day.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回从该日期时间和指定的时区组成的 ZonedDateTime 。此转换将忽略可见的本地日期时间，而是使用基础瞬间。这避免了本地时间线间隙或重叠的任何问题。结果的字段可能具有不同的值，例如小时，分钟，偶数天。

trans-unit.source: This returns a ZonedDateTime formed from this date-time and the specified time-zone. Where possible, the result will have the same local date-time as this object.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回从该日期时间和指定的时区形成的 ZonedDateTime 。在可能的情况下，结果将与此对象具有相同的本地日期时间。

trans-unit.source: This returns a ZonedDateTime formed from this date-time at the specified time-zone. The result will match this date-time as closely as possible. Time-zone rules, such as daylight savings, mean that not every local date-time is valid for the specified zone, thus the local date-time may be adjusted.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回从该日期时间在指定时区形成的 ZonedDateTime 。结果将尽可能与此日期时间匹配。夏时制等时区规则意味着，并非每个本地日期时间都对指定时区有效，因此可以调整本地日期时间。

trans-unit.source: This returns a ZonedDateTime, based on this one, with the amount in terms of the unit added. If it is not possible to add the amount, because the unit is not supported or for some other reason, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 这将基于此返回 ZonedDateTime ，并以添加的单位为单位。如果由于不支持该单位或由于其他某种原因而无法添加金额，则会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: This returns a ZonedDateTime, based on this one, with the amount in terms of the unit subtracted. If it is not possible to subtract the amount, because the unit is not supported or for some other reason, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 这将基于此返回 ZonedDateTime ，并减去以单位表示的数量。如果由于该单元不受支持或由于其他某种原因而无法减去该数量，则会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: This returns a ZonedDateTime, based on this one, with the date-time adjusted. The adjustment takes place using the specified adjuster strategy object. Read the documentation of the adjuster to understand what adjustment will be made.
trans-unit.target: 这将基于此返回 ZonedDateTime ，并调整日期时间。使用指定的调节器策略对象进行调节。阅读调节器的文档以了解将进行的调节。

trans-unit.source: This returns a ZonedDateTime, based on this one, with the specified amount added. The amount is typically Period or Duration but may be any other type implementing the TemporalAmount interface.
trans-unit.target: 这将基于此返回 ZonedDateTime ，并添加指定的数量。该金额通常是 Period 或 Duration ,但可以是实现 TemporalAmount 接口的任何其他类型。

trans-unit.source: This returns a ZonedDateTime, based on this one, with the specified amount subtracted. The amount is typically Period or Duration but may be any other type implementing the TemporalAmount interface.
trans-unit.target: 这将基于此返回 ZonedDateTime ，并减去指定的数量。该金额通常是 Period 或 Duration ,但可以是实现 TemporalAmount 接口的任何其他类型。

trans-unit.source: This returns a ZonedDateTime, based on this one, with the value for the specified field changed. This can be used to change any supported field, such as the year, month or day-of-month. If it is not possible to set the value, because the field is not supported or for some other reason, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 这将基于此返回 ZonedDateTime ，并更改指定字段的值。这可用于更改任何受支持的字段，例如年，月或日。如果由于该字段不受支持或出于其他原因而无法设置该值，则将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: This returns a chronology based on either the ID or the type. The chronology ID uniquely identifies the chronology. The calendar system type is defined by the CLDR specification.
This returns a chronology based on either the ID or the type. The chronology ID uniquely identifies the chronology. The calendar system type is defined by the CLDR specification.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回基于ID或类型的年表。的 chronology ID 唯一地标识了年表。所述 calendar system type 是由CLDR规范定义。

trans-unit.source: This returns a duration with the specified nano-of-second, retaining the seconds part of this duration.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定纳秒的持续时间,但保留秒的部分。

trans-unit.source: This returns a duration with the specified seconds, retaining the nano-of-second part of this duration.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定秒数的持续时间,保留秒数的纳秒部分。

trans-unit.source: This returns a formatter that will format or parse a date-time. The exact format pattern used varies by locale.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个格式化器,它将格式化或解析一个日期-时间。确切的格式模式因地区而异。

trans-unit.source: This returns a formatter that will format or parse a date. The exact format pattern used varies by locale.
trans-unit.target: 该函数返回一个格式化器,用于格式化或解析日期。确切的格式模式因地区而异。

trans-unit.source: This returns a formatter that will format or parse a time. The exact format pattern used varies by locale.
trans-unit.target: 该函数返回一个将格式化或解析时间的格式器。确切的格式模式因地区而异。

trans-unit.source: This returns a formatter with similar state to this formatter but with the override chronology set. By default, a formatter has no override chronology, returning null.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回一个状态与此格式化器类似的格式化器,但设置了覆盖年表。默认情况下,formatter没有覆盖时间顺序,返回null。

trans-unit.source: This returns a formatter with similar state to this formatter but with the override zone set. By default, a formatter has no override zone, returning null.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回一个状态与此格式化器相似但设置了覆盖区的格式化器。默认情况下,formatter没有覆盖区,返回null。

trans-unit.source: This returns a formatter with similar state to this formatter but with the resolver fields set. By default, a formatter has no resolver fields.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回状态与此格式化器类似、但设置了解析器字段的格式化器。默认情况下,一个formatter没有解析器字段。

trans-unit.source: This returns a formatter with similar state to this formatter but with the resolver style set. By default, a formatter has the SMART resolver style.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回状态与该格式化程序相似但设置了解析器样式的格式化程序。默认情况下，格式化程序具有 SMART 解析程序样式。

trans-unit.source: This returns a local date with the same year, month and day as this date-time.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回一个与该日期时间相同的年、月、日的本地日期。

trans-unit.source: This returns a local time with the same hour, minute, second and nanosecond as this date-time.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回一个与这个日期时间相同的时、分、秒和纳秒的本地时间。

trans-unit.source: This returns a map of historical rules keyed by a version string. The exact meaning and format of the version is provider specific. The version must follow lexicographical order, thus the returned map will be order from the oldest known rules to the newest available rules. The default 'TZDB' group uses version numbering consisting of the year followed by a letter, such as '2009e' or '2012f'.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回由版本字符串键入的历史规则地图。版本的确切含义和格式由提供者决定。版本必须遵循词法顺序,因此返回的地图将按照从最古老的已知规则到最新的可用规则的顺序排列。默认的'TZDB'组使用由年份和字母组成的版本号,如'2009e'或'2012f'。

trans-unit.source: This returns a month-day with the specified day-of-month. If the day-of-month is invalid for the month, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定月份的月日。如果该月的月日无效,会产生一个异常。

trans-unit.source: This returns a month-day with the specified month. If the day-of-month is invalid for the specified month, the day will be adjusted to the last valid day-of-month.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定月份的月日。如果指定月份的月日无效,则该日将被调整为最后一个有效的月日。

trans-unit.source: This returns a new object based on this one with the value for the specified field changed. For example, on a LocalDate, this could be used to set the year, month or day-of-month. The returned object will have the same observable type as this object.
trans-unit.target: 这将基于此对象返回一个新对象，并更改了指定字段的值。例如，在 LocalDate 上，这可用于设置年，月或日。返回的对象将具有与此对象相同的可观察类型。

trans-unit.source: This returns a new temporal object based on the specified one with the value for this field changed. For example, on a LocalDate, this could be used to set the year, month or day-of-month. The returned object has the same observable type as the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 这将根据指定的对象返回一个新的时间对象，并更改此字段的值。例如，在 LocalDate 上，这可用于设置年，月或日。返回的对象具有与指定对象相同的可观察类型。

trans-unit.source: This returns a period tied to the ISO chronology using the specified years, months and days. See Period for further details.
trans-unit.target: 这将使用指定的年，月和日返回与ISO时间顺序相关的时间段。有关更多详细信息，请参见 Period 。

trans-unit.source: This returns a period tied to this chronology using the specified years, months and days. All supplied chronologies use periods based on years, months and days, however the ChronoPeriod API allows the period to be represented using other units.
trans-unit.target: 这将使用指定的年，月和日返回与此年表相关的时间段。所有提供的时间顺序都使用基于年，月和日的时间段，但是 ChronoPeriod API允许使用其他单位来表示时间段。

trans-unit.source: This returns a period with each of the years, months and days units individually multiplied. For example, a period of "2 years, -3 months and 4 days" multiplied by 3 will return "6 years, -9 months and 12 days". No normalization is performed.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回一个年、月、日单位分别相乘的周期。例如,"2年3个月4天 "的周期乘以3将返回 "6年9个月12天"。没有进行归一化处理。

trans-unit.source: This returns a period with each of the years, months and days units individually negated. For example, a period of "2 years, -3 months and 4 days" will be negated to "-2 years, 3 months and -4 days". No normalization is performed.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回一个带有年、月、日单位的周期,每个单位都被单独否定。例如,"2年3个月4天 "的周期将被否定为"-2年3个月4天"。没有进行归一化处理。

trans-unit.source: This returns a period with each supported unit individually multiplied. For example, a period of "2 years, -3 months and 4 days" multiplied by 3 will return "6 years, -9 months and 12 days". No normalization is performed.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回一个周期,每个支持的单位分别乘以。例如,"2年零3个月零4天 "的周期乘以3将返回 "6年零9个月零12天"。没有进行归一化处理。

trans-unit.source: This returns a period with each supported unit individually negated. For example, a period of "2 years, -3 months and 4 days" will be negated to "-2 years, 3 months and -4 days". No normalization is performed.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回一个周期,每个支持的单位都被单独否定。例如,"2年3个月4天 "的周期将被否定为"-2年3个月4天"。没有进行归一化处理。

trans-unit.source: This returns a singleton query that provides access to additional information from the parse. The query always returns a non-null boolean, true if parsing saw a leap-second, false if not.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回一个单例查询，该查询提供对解析中其他信息的访问。查询始终返回非null布尔值，如果解析时看到a秒则返回true，否则返回false。

trans-unit.source: This returns a singleton query that provides access to additional information from the parse. The query always returns a non-null period, with a zero period returned instead of null.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回一个单例查询，该查询提供对解析中其他信息的访问。查询总是返回一个非空周期，返回零周期而不是null。

trans-unit.source: This returns a temporal object of the same observable type as the input with the date and time changed to be the same as this.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回一个与输入相同的可观察类型的时间对象,但日期和时间被改变为与此相同。

trans-unit.source: This returns a temporal object of the same observable type as the input with the date changed to be the same as this.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回一个与输入相同的可观察类型的时间对象,但将日期改为与此相同。

trans-unit.source: This returns a temporal object of the same observable type as the input with the day-of-week changed to be the same as this.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回一个与输入相同的可观测类型的时间对象,但将星期几改为与此相同。

trans-unit.source: This returns a temporal object of the same observable type as the input with the era changed to be the same as this.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回一个与输入相同的可观察类型的时间对象,但时代被改为与此相同。

trans-unit.source: This returns a temporal object of the same observable type as the input with the instant changed to be the same as this.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回一个与输入相同的可观察类型的时间对象,并将瞬间改变为与此相同。

trans-unit.source: This returns a temporal object of the same observable type as the input with the month and day-of-month changed to be the same as this.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回一个与输入相同的可观测类型的时间对象,但将月份和月日改为与此相同。

trans-unit.source: This returns a temporal object of the same observable type as the input with the month-of-year changed to be the same as this.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回一个与输入相同的可观测类型的时间对象,但将年月日改为与此相同。

trans-unit.source: This returns a temporal object of the same observable type as the input with the offset and time changed to be the same as this.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回一个与输入相同的观测类型的时间对象,但偏移量和时间被改变为与此相同。

trans-unit.source: This returns a temporal object of the same observable type as the input with the offset changed to be the same as this.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回一个与输入相同的可观察类型的时间对象,但偏移量改变为与此相同。

trans-unit.source: This returns a temporal object of the same observable type as the input with the offset, date and time changed to be the same as this.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回一个与输入相同的观测类型的时间对象,但偏移量、日期和时间被改为与此相同。

trans-unit.source: This returns a temporal object of the same observable type as the input with the time changed to be the same as this.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回一个与输入相同的可观察类型的时间对象,并将时间改为与此相同。

trans-unit.source: This returns a temporal object of the same observable type as the input with the year and month changed to be the same as this.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回一个与输入相同的可观测类型的时间对象,但将年和月改为与此相同。

trans-unit.source: This returns a temporal object of the same observable type as the input with the year changed to be the same as this.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回一个与输入相同的可观测类型的时间对象,但将年份改为与此相同。

trans-unit.source: This returns a temporal object of the same observable type as the input with this duration added.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回一个与输入相同的可观察类型的时间对象,并加上这个持续时间。

trans-unit.source: This returns a temporal object of the same observable type as the input with this duration subtracted.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回一个与输入相同的可观察类型的时间对象,并减去这个持续时间。

trans-unit.source: This returns a temporal object of the same observable type as the input with this period added.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回一个与输入相同的可观察类型的时间对象,并加上这个周期。

trans-unit.source: This returns a temporal object of the same observable type as the input with this period added. If the temporal has a chronology, it must be the ISO chronology.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回一个与输入相同的可观测类型的时间对象,并添加了这个周期。如果temporal有年表,它必须是ISO年表。

trans-unit.source: This returns a temporal object of the same observable type as the input with this period subtracted.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回一个与输入相同的可观测类型的时间对象,并减去这个周期。

trans-unit.source: This returns a temporal object of the same observable type as the input with this period subtracted. If the temporal has a chronology, it must be the ISO chronology.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回一个与输入相同的可观测类型的时间对象,并减去这个周期。如果temporal有一个年表,它必须是ISO年表。

trans-unit.source: This returns a value for each of the three supported units, YEARS, MONTHS and DAYS. All other units throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 这将为三个受支持的单位 YEARS ， MONTHS 和 DAYS 返回一个值。其他所有单元均引发异常。

trans-unit.source: This returns a value for each of the two supported units, SECONDS and NANOS. All other units throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 这将为两个受支持的单位 SECONDS 和 NANOS 返回一个值。其他所有单元均引发异常。

trans-unit.source: This returns a zoned date-time where the zone ID is the same as getOffset(). The local date-time, offset and instant of the result will be the same as in this date-time.
This returns a zoned date-time where the zone ID is the same as getOffset(). The local date-time, offset and instant of the result will be the same as in this date-time.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回一个区域日期时间，其中区域ID与 getOffset() 相同。结果的本地日期时间，偏移量和瞬时将与此日期时间相同。

trans-unit.source: This returns an Instant representing the same point on the time-line as this date-time.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回一个代表与该日期时间相同的时间点的 Instant 。

trans-unit.source: This returns an Instant representing the same point on the time-line as this date-time. The calculation combines the local date-time and offset.
This returns an Instant representing the same point on the time-line as this date-time. The calculation combines the local date-time and offset.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回一个代表与该日期时间相同的时间点的 Instant 。计算结合了本地日期时间和偏移量。

trans-unit.source: This returns an Instant, based on this one, with the amount in terms of the unit added. If it is not possible to add the amount, because the unit is not supported or for some other reason, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 这将基于此返回 Instant ，并以添加的单位为单位。如果由于不支持该单位或由于其他某种原因而无法添加金额，则会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: This returns an Instant, based on this one, with the amount in terms of the unit subtracted. If it is not possible to subtract the amount, because the unit is not supported or for some other reason, an exception is thrown.

This returns an Instant, based on this one, with the instant adjusted. The adjustment takes place using the specified adjuster strategy object. Read the documentation of the adjuster to understand what adjustment will be made.
trans-unit.target: 这将基于此实例返回 Instant ，并对其进行调整。使用指定的调节器策略对象进行调节。阅读调节器的文档以了解将进行的调节。

trans-unit.source: This returns an Instant, based on this one, with the specified amount added. The amount is typically Duration but may be any other type implementing the TemporalAmount interface.
trans-unit.target: 这将基于此返回 Instant ，并添加指定的数量。该数量通常是 Duration ,但是可以是实现 TemporalAmount 接口的任何其他类型。

trans-unit.source: This returns an Instant, based on this one, with the specified amount subtracted. The amount is typically Duration but may be any other type implementing the TemporalAmount interface.
trans-unit.target: 这将基于此返回 Instant ，并减去指定的数量。该数量通常是 Duration ,但是可以是实现 TemporalAmount 接口的任何其他类型。

trans-unit.source: This returns an Instant, based on this one, with the value for the specified field changed. If it is not possible to set the value, because the field is not supported or for some other reason, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 这将基于此返回 Instant ，并更改指定字段的值。如果由于该字段不受支持或出于其他原因而无法设置该值，则将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: This returns an OffsetDateTime formed from this date at the specified time. All possible combinations of date and time are valid.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回从该日期在指定时间 OffsetDateTime 形成的OffsetDateTime。日期和时间的所有可能组合均有效。

trans-unit.source: This returns an OffsetDateTime formed from this date-time at the specified offset. All possible combinations of date-time and offset are valid.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回从此日期时间以指定的偏移量形成的 OffsetDateTime 。日期时间和偏移量的所有可能组合均有效。

trans-unit.source: This returns an OffsetDateTime formed from this instant at the specified offset from UTC/Greenwich. An exception will be thrown if the instant is too large to fit into an offset date-time.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回从此时刻形成的 OffsetDateTime ，该时间与UTC /格林威治指定的偏移量。如果瞬间过大而无法适应偏移日期时间，则将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: This returns an OffsetDateTime formed from this time and the specified date. All possible combinations of date and time are valid.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回从该时间和指定日期形成的 OffsetDateTime 。日期和时间的所有可能组合均有效。

trans-unit.source: This returns an OffsetDateTime, based on this one, with the amount in terms of the unit added. If it is not possible to add the amount, because the unit is not supported or for some other reason, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 这将基于此返回 OffsetDateTime ，并以添加的单位为单位。如果由于不支持该单位或由于其他某种原因而无法添加金额，则会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: This returns an OffsetDateTime, based on this one, with the amount in terms of the unit subtracted. If it is not possible to subtract the amount, because the unit is not supported or for some other reason, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 这将基于此返回 OffsetDateTime ，并减去以单位表示的数量。如果由于该单元不受支持或由于其他某种原因而无法减去该数量，则会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: This returns an OffsetDateTime, based on this one, with the date-time adjusted. The adjustment takes place using the specified adjuster strategy object. Read the documentation of the adjuster to understand what adjustment will be made.
trans-unit.target: 这将基于此返回 OffsetDateTime ，并调整日期时间。使用指定的调节器策略对象进行调节。阅读调节器的文档以了解将进行的调节。

trans-unit.source: This returns an OffsetDateTime, based on this one, with the specified amount added. The amount is typically Period or Duration but may be any other type implementing the TemporalAmount interface.
trans-unit.target: 这将基于此返回 OffsetDateTime ，并添加指定的数量。该金额通常是 Period 或 Duration ,但可以是实现 TemporalAmount 接口的任何其他类型。

trans-unit.source: This returns an OffsetDateTime, based on this one, with the specified amount subtracted. The amount is typically Period or Duration but may be any other type implementing the TemporalAmount interface.
trans-unit.target: 这将基于此返回 OffsetDateTime ，并减去指定的数量。该金额通常是 Period 或 Duration ,但可以是实现 TemporalAmount 接口的任何其他类型。

trans-unit.source: This returns an OffsetDateTime, based on this one, with the value for the specified field changed. This can be used to change any supported field, such as the year, month or day-of-month. If it is not possible to set the value, because the field is not supported or for some other reason, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 这将基于此返回 OffsetDateTime ，并更改指定字段的值。这可用于更改任何受支持的字段，例如年，月或日。如果由于该字段不受支持或出于其他原因而无法设置该值，则将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: This returns an OffsetTime formed from this time at the specified offset. All possible combinations of time and offset are valid.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回从此时间开始在指定偏移量处形成的 OffsetTime 。时间和偏移量的所有可能组合均有效。

trans-unit.source: This returns an OffsetTime, based on this one, with the amount in terms of the unit added. If it is not possible to add the amount, because the unit is not supported or for some other reason, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 这将基于此返回 OffsetTime ，并以添加的单位为单位。如果由于不支持该单位或由于其他某种原因而无法添加金额，则会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: This returns an OffsetTime, based on this one, with the amount in terms of the unit subtracted. If it is not possible to subtract the amount, because the unit is not supported or for some other reason, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 这将基于此返回 OffsetTime ，并减去以单位表示的数量。如果由于该单元不受支持或由于其他某种原因而无法减去该数量，则会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: This returns an OffsetTime, based on this one, with the specified amount added. The amount is typically Duration but may be any other type implementing the TemporalAmount interface.
trans-unit.target: 这将基于此返回 OffsetTime ，并添加指定的数量。该数量通常是 Duration ,但是可以是实现 TemporalAmount 接口的任何其他类型。

trans-unit.source: This returns an OffsetTime, based on this one, with the specified amount subtracted. The amount is typically Duration but may be any other type implementing the TemporalAmount interface.
trans-unit.target: 这将基于此返回 OffsetTime ，并减去指定的数量。该数量通常是 Duration ,但是可以是实现 TemporalAmount 接口的任何其他类型。

trans-unit.source: This returns an OffsetTime, based on this one, with the time adjusted. The adjustment takes place using the specified adjuster strategy object. Read the documentation of the adjuster to understand what adjustment will be made.
trans-unit.target: 这将基于此返回 OffsetTime ，并调整时间。使用指定的调节器策略对象进行调节。阅读调节器的文档以了解将进行的调节。

trans-unit.source: This returns an OffsetTime, based on this one, with the value for the specified field changed. This can be used to change any supported field, such as the hour, minute or second. If it is not possible to set the value, because the field is not supported or for some other reason, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 这将基于此返回 OffsetTime ，并更改指定字段的值。这可用于更改任何受支持的字段，例如小时，分钟或秒。如果由于该字段不受支持或出于其他原因而无法设置该值，则将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: This returns an ZonedDateTime formed from this instant at the specified time-zone. An exception will be thrown if the instant is too large to fit into a zoned date-time.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回从此瞬间在指定时区形成的 ZonedDateTime 。如果瞬间过大而无法适应分区的日期时间，则将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: This returns an ImageProducer for this VolatileImage.

This returns an ImageProducer for this VolatileImage. Note that the VolatileImage object is optimized for rendering operations and blitting to the screen or other VolatileImage objects, as opposed to reading back the pixels of the image. Therefore, operations such as getSource may not perform as fast as operations that do not rely on reading the pixels. Note also that the pixel values read from the image are current with those in the image only at the time that they are retrieved. This method takes a snapshot of the image at the time the request is made and the ImageProducer object returned works with that static snapshot image, not the original VolatileImage. Calling getSource() is equivalent to calling getSnapshot().getSource().

trans-unit.source: This returns an immutable formatter capable of formatting and parsing the ISO-8601 instant format. When formatting, the second-of-minute is always output. The nano-of-second outputs zero, three, six or nine digits as necessary. When parsing, time to at least the seconds field is required. Fractional seconds from zero to nine are parsed. The localized decimal style is not used.

This returns an immutable formatter capable of formatting and parsing the ISO-8601 instant format. When formatting, the second-of-minute is always output. The nano-of-second outputs zero, three, six or nine digits digits as necessary. When parsing, time to at least the seconds field is required. Fractional seconds from zero to nine are parsed. The localized decimal style is not used.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回一个能够格式化和解析ISO-8601即时格式的不可改变的格式器。格式化时,总是输出分钟的秒数。nano-of-second根据需要输出0、3、6或9位数字。解析时,要求时间至少到秒字段。从零到九的小数秒都会被解析。不使用本地化的十进制样式。

trans-unit.source: This returns an instant representing the current instant as defined by the clock.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个由时钟定义的代表当前瞬间的瞬间。

trans-unit.source: This returns details of the next transition after the specified instant. For example, if the instant represents a point where "Summer" daylight savings time applies, then the method will return the transition to the next "Winter" time.

trans-unit.source: This returns details of the previous transition after the specified instant. For example, if the instant represents a point where "summer" daylight saving time applies, then the method will return the transition from the previous "winter" time.

trans-unit.source: This returns details of the previous transition before the specified instant. For example, if the instant represents a point where "summer" daylight saving time applies, then the method will return the transition from the previous "winter" time.

trans-unit.source: This returns the millisecond-based instant, measured from 1970-01-01T00:00Z (UTC). This is equivalent to the definition of System.currentTimeMillis().

trans-unit.source: This returns the milliseconds part by dividing the number of nanoseconds by 1,000,000. The length of the duration is stored using two fields - seconds and nanoseconds. The nanoseconds part is a value from 0 to 999,999,999 that is an adjustment to the length in seconds. The total duration is defined by calling getNano() and getSeconds().

trans-unit.source: This row of data has been updated.

This row of data has been updated. To denote the arrival of a completely new table with a different structure use HEADER_ROW as the value for the row. When the JTable receives this event and its autoCreateColumnsFromModel flag is set it discards any TableColumns that it had and reallocates default ones in the order they appear in the model. This is the same as calling setModel(TableModel) on the JTable.

This specification describes the Java Smart Card I/O API defined by JSR 268. It defines a Java API for communication with Smart Cards using ISO/IEC 7816-4 APDUs. It thereby allows Java applications to interact with applications running on the Smart Card, to store and retrieve data on the card, etc.
This specification does not refine the Object.equals(java.lang.Object) method. In other words, if you parse the same schema twice, you may still get !schemaA.equals(schemaB).

This specification is divided into two sections. The first section, Summary, covers the basic formatting concepts. The second section, Details, covers the specific implementation details. It is intended for users who want more precise specification of formatting behavior.

trans-unit.source: This synchronization provider uses an optimistic concurrency model, assuming that there will be few conflicts among users who are accessing the same data in a database. This value is always in the range -1 through pos. If there is no marked position in the input stream, this field is -1. If there is a marked position in the input stream, then buf[markpos] is the first byte to be supplied as input after a reset operation. If markpos is not -1, then all bytes from positions buf[markpos] through buf[pos-1] must remain in the buffer array (though they may be moved to another place in the buffer array, with suitable adjustments to the values of count, pos, and markpos); they may not be discarded unless and until the difference between pos and markpos exceeds marklimit.
trans-unit.target: 该值始终在 -1 到 pos 之间。如果输入流中没有标记的位置，则此字段为 -1 。如果输入流中有标记的位置，则 buf[markpos] 是 reset 操作后要作为输入提供的第一个字节。如果 markpos 不是 -1 ，则从位置 buf[markpos] 到 buf[pos-1] 所有字节都必须保留在缓冲区数组中（尽管可以将它们移动到缓冲区数组中的另一个位置，并适当地调整的值）。 count ， pos 和 markpos ）; 除非并且直到 pos 和 markpos 之差超过 marklimit ,否则不得丢弃它们。

trans-unit.source: This value is always in the range 0 through count. If it is less than count, then buf[pos] is the next byte to be supplied as input; if it is equal to count, then the next read or skip operation will require more bytes to be read from the contained input stream.
trans-unit.target: 此值始终在 0 到 count 范围内。如果小于 count ，则 buf[pos] 是要作为输入提供的下一个字节；如果等于 count ，则下一个 read 或 skip 操作将需要从包含的输入流中读取更多字节。

This would allow an attacker to configure the system identity scope with certificates that should not be trusted, thereby granting applet or application code signed with those certificates privileges that would have been denied by the system's original identity scope.
trans-unit.target: 这将允许攻击者用不应被信任的证书来配置系统身份范围,从而授予用这些证书签署的小程序或应用程序代码特权,而这些特权本来会被系统的原始身份范围所拒绝。

trans-unit.source: This would allow an attacker to replace somebody else's (the "target's") keypair with a possibly weaker keypair (e.g., a keypair of a smaller keysize). This also would allow the attacker to listen in on encrypted communication between the target and its peers. The target's peers might wrap an encryption session key under the target's "new" public key, which would allow the attacker (who possesses the corresponding private key) to unwrap the session key and decipher the communication data encrypted under that session key.
trans-unit.target: 这将允许攻击者用可能较弱的密钥对(例如密钥大小较小的密钥对)替换别人("目标 "的)的密钥对。这也允许攻击者监听目标与其对等体之间的加密通信。目标的对等体可能会在目标的 "新 "公开密钥下包裹一个加密会话密钥,这将允许攻击者(拥有相应的私人密钥)解开会话密钥,并破译在该会话密钥下加密的通信数据。

trans-unit.source: This would allow code to read the particular file associated with the file descriptor read. This is dangerous if the file contains confidential data.
trans-unit.target: 这将允许代码读取与读取的文件描述符相关的特定文件。如果文件中包含机密数据,这是很危险的。

trans-unit.source: This would allow code to read the value, or determine the existence, of a particular environment variable. This is dangerous if the variable contains confidential data.
trans-unit.target: 这将允许代码读取特定环境变量的值,或确定其存在。如果该变量包含机密数据,这是很危险的。

trans-unit.source: This would allow malfeasant code to share potentially sensitive or confidential information.

This would allow malicious code to add tray icons to the system tray. First, such an icon may look like the icon of some known application (such as a firewall or anti-virus) and order a user to do something unsafe (with help of balloon messages). Second, the system tray may be glutted with tray icons so that no one could add a tray icon anymore.

This would allow somebody to introduce a possibly malicious provider (e.g., one that discloses the private keys passed to it) as the highest-priority provider. This would be possible because the Security object (which manages the installed providers) currently does not check the integrity or authenticity of a provider before attaching it.
trans-unit.target: 这将允许某人引入一个可能是恶意的提供者(例如,披露传递给它的私钥的提供者)作为最高优先级的提供者。这样做是可能的,因为安全对象(管理已安装的提供者)目前在附加提供者之前并不检查其完整性或真实性。

trans-unit.source: This would allow somebody to introduce a possibly malicious provider (e.g., one that discloses the private keys passed to it) as the highest-priority provider. This would be possible because the Security object (which manages the installed providers) currently does not check the integrity or authenticity of a provider before attaching it. The "insertProvider" permission subsumes the "insertProvider.{provider name}" permission (see the section below for more information).
trans-unit.target: 这将允许某人引入一个可能是恶意的提供者(例如,披露传递给它的私钥的提供者)作为最高优先级的提供者。这将是可能的,因为安全对象(管理已安装的提供者)目前在附加提供者之前并不检查提供者的完整性或真实性。"insertProvider "权限从属于 "insertProvider.{提供者名称}"权限(更多信息请参见下节)。

trans-unit.source: This would grant an attacker permission to get the class loader for a particular class. This is dangerous because having access to a class's class loader allows the attacker to load other classes available to that class loader. The attacker would typically otherwise not have access to those classes.
trans-unit.target: 这将授予攻击者获取某个类的类加载器的权限。这是很危险的,因为拥有对一个类的类加载器的访问权限,可以让攻击者加载该类加载器可用的其他类。否则,攻击者通常无法访问这些类。

trans-unit.source: This writeReplace method is invoked by serialization if the method exists and it would be accessible from a method defined within the class of the object being serialized. Thus, the method can have private, protected and package-private access. Subclass access to this method follows java accessibility rules.
trans-unit.target: 如果这个writeReplace方法存在,并且它可以从被序列化对象的类中定义的方法访问,那么这个writeReplace方法就会被序列化调用。因此,该方法可以有私有、保护和包私有的访问权限。子类对该方法的访问遵循java的可访问性规则。

trans-unit.source: Though null is a valid name, when getAttributes(null) is invoked on a Manifest obtained from a jar file, null will be returned. While jar files themselves do not allow null-named attributes, it is possible to invoke getEntries() on a Manifest, and on that result, invoke put with a null key and an arbitrary value. Subsequent invocations of getAttributes(null) will return the just-put value.

Subsequent invocations of getAttributes(null) will return the just-put value.

trans-unit.source: Thread pools address two different problems: they usually provide improved performance when executing large numbers of asynchronous tasks, due to reduced per-task invocation overhead, and they provide a means of bounding and managing the resources, including threads, consumed when executing a collection of tasks. Each ThreadPoolExecutor also maintains some basic statistics, such as the number of completed tasks.
trans-unit.target: 线程池解决了两个不同的问题：由于减少了每个任务的调用开销，它们通常在执行大量异步任务时可提供改进的性能，并且它们提供了一种绑定和管理资源（包括线程）的方法，这些资源在执行一个集合时消耗任务。每个 ThreadPoolExecutor 还维护一些基本统计信息，例如已完成任务的数量。

trans-unit.source: Thread state for a runnable thread.
Thread state for a runnable thread. A thread in the runnable state is executing in the Java virtual machine but it may be waiting for other resources from the operating system such as processor.

trans-unit.target: 终止线程的线程状态。该线程已完成执行。

trans-unit.source: Thread state for a thread blocked waiting for a monitor lock.

Thread state for a thread blocked waiting for a monitor lock. A thread in the blocked state is waiting for a monitor lock to enter a synchronized block/method or reenter a synchronized block/method after calling Object.wait.

Thread state for a thread blocked waiting for a monitor lock. A thread in the blocked state is waiting for a monitor lock to enter a synchronized block/method or reenter a synchronized block/method after calling Object.wait.
trans-unit.target: 线程的线程状态被阻塞，等待监视器锁定。处于阻塞状态的线程在调用 Object.wait 之后正在等待监视器锁定输入同步的块/方法或重新输入同步的块/方法。

trans-unit.source: Three methods on a TextLayout object (getNextRightHit, getNextLeftHit, and hitTestChar) return instances of TextHitInfo. The offsets contained in these TextHitInfo objects are relative to the start of the TextLayout, not to the text used to create the TextLayout. Similarly, TextLayout methods that accept TextHitInfo instances as parameters expect the TextHitInfo object's offsets to be relative to the TextLayout, not to any underlying text storage model.

trans-unit.source: Through methods of the Line interface, which Mixer extends, a mixer might provide a set of controls that are global to the mixer. For example, the mixer can have a master gain control. These global controls are distinct from the controls belonging to each of the mixer's individual lines.
trans-unit.target: 通过 Mixer 扩展的 Line 接口的方法，混合器可以提供一组对于混合器全局的控件。例如，混频器可以具有主增益控制。这些全局控件与属于混音器各行的控件不同。

trans-unit.source: Throughout this specification, a "non-exported package" refers to a package that is not exported to all modules, and a "non-open package" refers to a package that is not open to all modules. Specifically, these terms refer to a package that either is not exported/open by its containing module or is exported/open in a qualified fashion by its containing module.

Throughput and scalability are generally highest for the default barging (also known as greedy, renouncement, and convoy-avoidance) strategy. While this is not guaranteed to be fair or starvation-free, earlier queued threads are allowed to recontend before later queued threads, and each recontention has an unbiased chance to succeed against incoming threads. Also, while acquires do not "spin" in the usual sense, they may perform multiple invocations of tryAcquire interspersed with other computations before blocking. This gives most of the benefits of spins when exclusive synchronization is only briefly held, without most of the liabilities when it isn't. If so desired, you can augment this by preceding calls to acquire methods with "fast-path" checks, possibly prechecking hasContended() and/or hasQueuedThreads() to only do so if the synchronizer is likely not to be contended.

Throughput and scalability are generally highest for the default barging (also known as greedy, renouncement, and convoy-avoidance) strategy. While this is not guaranteed to be fair or starvation-free, earlier queued threads are allowed to recontend before later queued threads, and each recontention has an unbiased chance to succeed against incoming threads. Also, while acquires do not "spin" in the usual sense, they may perform multiple invocations of tryAcquire interspersed with other computations before blocking. This gives most of the benefits of spins when exclusive synchronization is only briefly held, without most of the liabilities when it isn't. If so desired, you can augment this by preceding calls to acquire methods with "fast-path" checks, possibly prechecking hasContended() and/or hasQueuedThreads() to only do so if the synchronizer is likely not to be contended.
trans-unit.target: 对于默认插入（也称为greedy，retouncement和convoy-avoidance）策略，吞吐量和可伸缩性通常最高。尽管不能保证这是公平的，也可以避免饥饿，但允许在较早排队的线程在较晚排队的线程之前进行重新竞争，并且每个重新争用都可以毫无偏向地成功抵御传入线程。另外，尽管通常情况下获取并不会“旋转”，但是它们可能会多次调用 tryAcquire 在阻塞之前散布其他计算。当仅短暂地保持排他同步时，这将提供旋转的大部分好处，而在没有同步时，则不会带来很多负担。如果需要，您可以通过在调用之前对获取方法进行“快速路径”检查来增强此功能，并可能预先检查 hasContended() 和/或 hasQueuedThreads() 以仅在可能不争用同步器的情况下才这样做。

trans-unit.source: Throwing an error in these cases may seem extreme. The rationale for this behavior is that a malformed provider-configuration file, like a malformed class file, indicates a serious problem with the way the Java virtual machine is configured or is being used. As such it is preferable to throw an error rather than try to recover or, even worse, fail silently.
Thrown by String methods to indicate that an index is either negative or greater than the size of the string.
trans-unit.target: 由 String 方法抛出，以指示索引为负数或大于字符串的大小。

trans-unit.source: Thrown by String methods to indicate that an index is either negative or greater than the size of the string. For some methods such as the charAt method, this exception also is thrown when the index is equal to the size of the string.

Thrown by String methods to indicate that an index is either negative or greater than the size of the string. For some methods such as the charAt method, this exception also is thrown when the index is equal to the size of the string.
trans-unit.target: 由 String 方法抛出，以指示索引为负数或大于字符串的大小。对于某些方法，例如charAt方法，当索引等于字符串的大小时，也会引发此异常。

trans-unit.source: Thrown by a ModuleFinder when an error occurs finding a module.
Thrown by a ModuleFinder when an error occurs finding a module. Also thrown by Configuration.resolve when resolution fails for observability-related reasons.
Thrown by a Scanner to indicate that the token retrieved does not match the pattern for the expected type, or that the token is out of range for the expected type.
trans-unit.target: 由 Scanner 抛出，以指示检索到的令牌与预期类型的​​模式不匹配，或者令牌超出预期类型的​​范围。

trans-unit.source: Thrown by a method invocation on a proxy instance if its invocation handler's invoke method throws a checked exception (a Throwable that is not assignable to RuntimeException or Error) that is not assignable to any of the exception types declared in the throws clause of the method that was invoked on the proxy instance and dispatched to the invocation handler.

Thrown by a method invocation on a proxy instance if its invocation handler's invoke method throws a checked exception (a Throwable that is not assignable to RuntimeException or Error) that is not assignable to any of the exception types declared in the throws clause of the method that was invoked on the proxy instance and dispatched to the invocation handler.
trans-unit.target: 如果代理实例的 invoke 方法的调用方法引发了检查后的异常（不可分配给 RuntimeException 或 Error 的 Throwable ），而该异常无法分配给该方法的 throws 子句中声明的任何异常类型，则由代理实例的方法调用抛出该异常在代理实例上被调用并调度到调用处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Thrown by an implementation of ClassFileTransformer.transform when its input parameters are invalid.

Thrown by an implementation of ClassFileTransformer.transform when its input parameters are invalid. This may occur either because the initial class file bytes were invalid or a previously applied transform corrupted the bytes.
Thrown by an implementation of ClassFileTransformer.transform when its input parameters are invalid.
trans-unit.target: 当其输入参数无效时，由 ClassFileTransformer.transform 的实现抛出该异常。

trans-unit.source: Thrown by an implementation of Instrumentation.redefineClasses when one of the specified classes cannot be modified.
Thrown by an implementation of Instrumentation.redefineClasses when one of the specified classes cannot be modified.

trans-unit.source: Thrown by method createFont in the Font class to indicate that the specified font is bad.

trans-unit.source: Thrown by methods in the Stack class to indicate that the stack is empty.
trans-unit.target: 由 Stack 类中的方法抛出，以指示堆栈为空。

trans-unit.source: Thrown by the security manager to indicate a security violation.
trans-unit.target: 由安全经理抛出,表示有安全违规行为。

trans-unit.source: Thrown by various accessor methods to indicate that the element being requested does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 由各种访问器方法抛出,表示被请求的元素不存在。

trans-unit.source: Thrown if an application attempts to access or modify a field, or to call a method that it does not have access to.
trans-unit.target: 如果应用程序试图访问或修改一个字段,或调用一个它没有访问权限的方法,则抛出。

trans-unit.source: Thrown if an application tries to access or modify a specified field of an object, and that object no longer has that field.
trans-unit.target: 如果应用程序试图访问或修改一个对象的指定字段,并且该对象不再拥有该字段,则抛出。

trans-unit.source: Thrown if an application tries to call a specified method of a class (either static or instance), and that class no longer has a definition of that method.
trans-unit.target: 如果应用程序试图调用一个类的指定方法(无论是静态的还是实例的),并且该类不再有该方法的定义,则抛出。

trans-unit.source: Thrown if an application tries to create an array with negative size.

trans-unit.source: Thrown to indicate a problem with time-zone configuration.

trans-unit.source: Thrown to indicate some unexpected internal error has occurred in the Java Virtual Machine.

trans-unit.source: Thrown to indicate that a HTTP request needs to be retried but cannot be retried automatically, due to streaming mode being enabled.

trans-unit.source: Thrown to indicate that a malformed URL has occurred.

trans-unit.source: Thrown to indicate that a method has been called by an inappropriate caller.

trans-unit.source: Thrown to indicate that a program has attempted to access an element of an annotation type that was added to the annotation type definition after the annotation was compiled (or serialized).
trans-unit.target: 抛出表示程序试图访问注释类型的元素,该元素在注释编译(或序列化)后被添加到注释类型定义中。

trans-unit.source: Thrown to indicate that a program has attempted to access an element of an annotation type that was added to the annotation type definition after the annotation was compiled (or serialized). trans-unit.target: 引发以指示程序在编译（或序列化）注释后尝试访问添加到注释类型定义中的注释类型的元素。如果新元素具有默认值，则不会引发此异常。用于反射性地读取注释的API可以引发此异常。

trans-unit.source: Thrown to indicate that a program has attempted to access an element of an annotation whose type has changed after the annotation was compiled (or serialized). This exception can be thrown by the API used to read annotations reflectively.
trans-unit.target: 抛出该异常以指示程序尝试访问注释的元素，该元素的类型在编译（或序列化）注释后已更改。用于反射性地读取注释的API可以引发此异常。

trans-unit.source: Thrown to indicate that a thread has attempted to wait on an object's monitor or to notify other threads waiting on an object's monitor without owning the specified monitor.
trans-unit.target: 抛出,表示一个线程已经尝试在对象的监视器上等待,或者通知其他线程在没有拥有指定监视器的情况下在对象的监视器上等待。

trans-unit.source: Thrown to indicate that a thread is not in an appropriate state for the requested operation.

Thrown to indicate that an array has been accessed with an illegal index.

Thrown when a problem with configuration with the Schema Factories exists.

trans-unit.source: Thrown when an application tries to access a type using a string representing the type's name, but no definition for the type with the specified name can be found.
trans-unit.target: 当应用程序试图使用代表类型名称的字符串访问类型,但没有找到指定名称的类型定义时抛出。

trans-unit.source: Thrown when an application tries to access a type using a string representing the type's name, but no definition for the type with the specified name can be found. This exception differs from ClassNotFoundException in that ClassNotFoundException is a checked exception, whereas this exception is unchecked.
trans-unit.target: 当应用程序尝试使用表示类型名称的字符串访问类型时抛出，但是找不到具有指定名称的类型的定义。此异常与 ClassNotFoundException 的不同之处在于， ClassNotFoundException 是已检查的异常，而此异常是未检查的。

trans-unit.target: 当应用程序试图通过名称访问一个枚举常量,而枚举类型不包含指定名称的常量时,抛出。
